name: Clockwork Carpark
description:
WASD or Arrows keys to move.
Hold Space bar to start aiming a dash, release to dash.

Made for the Kenney Jam 2021

Music from Open Game Art:
https://opengameart.org/content/loading-screen-loop
https://opengameart.org/content/the-field-of-dreams
https://opengameart.org/content/nes-shooter-music-5-tracks-3-jingles

The idea was about a clockwork tower that's haunted or something, chafed against the constraints haha. Was lots of fun, hope you're having fun playing it. Cheers
